```{r}
mydata <- mpg
```

```{r}
ggplot(mydata, aes(manufacturer)) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(angle = 90)) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    title = "Count of Cars Manufactured by Major Car Brands",
    x = "Manufacturer",
    y = "Count"
  )
  
```
